description: A request sent from the AT to content

pattern.description: A url that both uniquely identifies the request/response pattern being used, and points to a schema for validating requests and responses

requestId.description: An id generated by the AT to uniquely identify a request within the context of a document

appId.description: An id corresponding to the content-rendering browser or other application that the request should be routed to. Originally sent to AT in observerAdded message.

docId.description: An id corresponding to the document the request should be routed to. Originally sent to AT in observerAdded message.

uid.description: An id corresponding to the in-page object the request should be routed to. Originally sent to AT in observerAdded message.

timeout.description: Time in ms before request is automatically cancelled

multiSend.description: Can multiple responses be sent for the same request?

detail.description: The request details provided by the AT. Must validate against the request subschema linked to by the pattern url.
